verses.verse: That <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> as the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

To <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H6549>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6549>Neco<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was by the <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> <S%H5104>River<s%> at <S%H3751>Carchemish,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5221>defeated<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%>
<S%H6186>"Line<s%> up the <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6793>buckler,<s%> And <S%H5066>draw<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle!<s%>

<S%H631>"Harness<s%> the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> And <S%H5927>mount<s%> the <S%H9463>steeds,<s%> And <S%H3320>take<s%> your <S%H3320>stand<s%> with <S%H3553>helmets<s%> [on!] <S%H4838>Polish<s%> the <S%H7420>spears,<s%> <S%H3847>Put<s%> on the scale-armor!

<S%H4069>"Why<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> [it?] They are <S%H9181>terrified,<s%> They are <S%H5472>drawing<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> And their <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> are <S%H3807>defeated<s%> And have <S%H5127>taken<s%> <S%H5127>refuge<s%> in <S%H4498>flight,<s%> <S%H3808>Without<s%> <S%H6437>facing<s%> <S%H6437>back;<s%> <S%H4032>Terror<s%> is on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side!<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Let not the <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H7031>man<s%> <S%H5127>flee,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> <S%H4422>escape;<s%> In the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> They have <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H5927>rises<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> Like the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> whose <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1607>surge<s%> about?

<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5927>rises<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> Even like the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> whose <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1607>surge<s%> about; And He has <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5927>rise<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> [that] <S%H776>land;<s%> I will surely destroy the <S%H6>city<s%> and its <S%H5892>inhabitants.<s%>"

<S%H5927>Go<s%> up, you <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H1984>drive<s%> <S%H1984>madly,<s%> you <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> That the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> may <S%H3318>march<s%> <S%H3318>forward:<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and <S%H6316>Put,<s%> that <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H4043>shield,<s%> And the <S%H3866>Lydians,<s%> that <S%H8610>handle<s%> [and] <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow.<s%>

For that <S%H3117>day<s%> belongs to the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> so as to <S%H5358>avenge<s%> Himself on His <S%H6862>foes;<s%> And the <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> and be <S%H7646>satiated<s%> And <S%H7301>drink<s%> its <S%H7301>fill<s%> of their <S%H1818>blood;<s%> For there will be a <S%H2077>slaughter<s%> for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

<S%H5927>Go<s%> up to <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3947>obtain<s%> <S%H6875>balm,<s%> O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt!<s%> In <S%H7723>vain<s%> have you <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H7499>remedies;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H9645>healing<s%> for you.

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of your <S%H7036>shame,<s%> And the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of your <S%H6682>cry<s%> [of distress;] For one <S%H1368>warrior<s%> has <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> over <S%H1368>another,<s%> And <S%H8147>both<s%> of them have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>

[This is] the <S%H1697>message<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> about the <S%H935>coming<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

<S%H5046>"Declare<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H8085>proclaim<s%> in <S%H4024>Migdol,<s%> <S%H8085>Proclaim<s%> also in <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> and <S%H8471>Tahpanhes;<s%> <S%H559>Say,<s%> <S%H3320>'Take<s%> your <S%H3320>stand<s%> and <S%H3559>get<s%> yourself <S%H3559>ready,<s%> For the <S%H2719>sword<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> those <S%H5439>around<s%> you.'

<S%H4069>"Why<s%> have your <S%H47>mighty<s%> <S%H47>ones<s%> <S%H5502>become<s%> <S%H5502>prostrate<s%>? They do not <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1920>thrust<s%> them <S%H1920>down.<s%>

"They have <S%H7235>repeatedly<s%> <S%H3782>stumbled;<s%> <S%H1571>Indeed,<s%> they have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7453>another.<s%> Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>'Get<s%> up! And let us <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> To our own <S%H5971>people<s%> and our <S%H4138>native<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> Away from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3238>oppressor.<s%>'

"They <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H6547>'Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> [is but] a <S%H7588>big<s%> <S%H7588>noise;<s%> He has let the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> by!'

"As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%> Whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> one shall <S%H935>come<s%> [who looms up] like <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> among the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> Or like <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H6213>"Make<s%> your <S%H3627>baggage<s%> <S%H6213>ready<s%> for <S%H1473>exile,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> For <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation;<s%> It will even be <S%H3341>burned<s%> <S%H3341>down<s%> [and] <S%H4480>bereft<s%> <S%H369><s%> of <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>
<S%H4714>"Egypt<s%> is a <S%H3304>pretty<s%> <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> [But] a <S%H7171>horsefly<s%> is <S%H935>coming<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> â€“ it is <S%H935>coming!<s%>

<S%H1571>"Also<s%> her <S%H7917>mercenaries<s%> in her <S%H7130>midst<s%> Are like <S%H4770>fattened<s%> <S%H5695>calves,<s%> For <S%H1571>even<s%> they <S%H1571>too<s%> have <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H6437>back<s%> [and] have <S%H5127>fled<s%> away <S%H9191>together;<s%> They did not <S%H5975>stand<s%> [their ground.] For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> upon them, The <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>punishment.<s%>

"Its <S%H6963>sound<s%> <S%H1980>moves<s%> along like a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> For they <S%H1980>move<s%> on like an <S%H2428>army<s%> And <S%H935>come<s%> to her as <S%H2404>woodcutters<s%> with <S%H7134>axes.<s%>

"They have <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> her <S%H9194>forest,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> it will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4480>[more<s%>] be <S%H2713>found,<s%> Even <S%H3588>though<s%> they are [now] more <S%H7231>numerous<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H697>locusts<s%> And are <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number.<s%>

"The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> has <S%H954>been<s%> <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> <S%H5414>Given<s%> over to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>"

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H528>Amon<s%> of <S%H4996>Thebes,<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> along with her <S%H430>gods<s%> and her <S%H4428>kings,<s%> even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and those who <S%H982>trust<s%> in him.

"And I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them over to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of those who are <S%H1245>seeking<s%> their <S%H5315>lives,<s%> even into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>officers.<s%> <S%H310>Afterwards,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> however, it will be <S%H7931>inhabited<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"But as for you, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> I am going to <S%H3467>save<s%> you from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> And your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and be <S%H8252>undisturbed<s%> And <S%H7599>secure,<s%> with <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> making [him] <S%H2729>tremble.<s%>

"O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "For I am with you. For I shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3617>full<s%> <S%H3617>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>Where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> you, Yet I shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3617>full<s%> <S%H3617>end<s%> of you; But I shall <S%H3256>correct<s%> you <S%H4941>properly<s%> And by <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>leave<s%> you <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>"
